synthesis_conditions.note: Prepared with the same synthetic procedure of PCP-N·4H2O using Hdpt instead of Hppt.

activation_conditions.method: Evacuated for 5 h at 120 °C under reduced pressure (<10−3 mbar)

conditions.method: Volumetric technique using Belsorp-max adsorption instrument
conditions.preparation: Solvent-exchanged sample was prepared by immersing the as-synthesized samples in methanol for 3 days to remove nonvolatile solvents, decanted every 10 h, and fresh methanol was replaced.
conditions.activation: Heated at 120 °C under reduced pressure (<10−2 Pa) for more than 20 h.

conditions.method: Coincident PXRD/adsorption measurements using Rigaku UltimaIV with CuKα radiation connected with BELSORP-18 volumetric adsorption equipment.
DFT with M06-2X functional using Gaussian 09 program package
conditions.additional_information: One diffuse function was added to N atoms in the triazole moieties directly coordinated to Fe atoms.
